message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $14,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While this product is worth a lot more to me, I'm willing to come down to $12,500.  I'm confident you won't find this value elsewhere.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with a price of $9,500 for the product.
